itemscollection.description: Lauren Bowen was offered her dream job on- the-spot at age 23. It’s likely because the South Florida brewery rep knows her craft – craft beer, that is.

itemscollection.headline: 54 day dreamer
itemscollection.description: Dreams usually fade as eyes open, but not for Kyle Michaud who built a 12-hour Green Planet Festival based on what hit him during an unconscious state.
